I'm going to add a little green food

getting it as even as possible because I

a bread knife for this because it gives

they're all exactly the same size now

as of each of those slices are nice and
even on top for this next slide it pays
to have I've got a really large scraper
but you can also use just like a piece

level it in the center of the board
taking a bit more of that ganache and

again we're going to pick up our next
layer so you want to make sure here that

of your bottom layer the next layer
should have a green then the next layer
should have brown on the outside and
then lastly I should have green this is
going to make sure that you get that

again you want to add another layer of

and I hope that I'm showing you guys
something that you haven't seen before
add your last layer of cake and a final

don't worry if this is not absolutely

but do try to keep those corners all

it's all looking a bit Brown at the

tips going to do most of the detail work
on top of your cake so really I'm just
tracking and lifting and letting the

make it look like the Minecraft block by
bringing those grass strands all the way
down the sides you might finally have a

the frosting sticking to the sides of
that Oreo cookie because the oreo cookie

underneath you can see around the edges

finally you can position your little

that Steve because they're quite tall
